name: USAlliance For Music
goal: The USAlliance For Music is a coalition of all sectors representing the US music community and industry, composers and lyricists, performing artists, music publishers, record companies, music managers and collecting societies.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Directive on Copyright in the Digital Single Market  COM 2016 (593)
